Paris, August 26 (mai ƙidãya Ge Wenbo) a shekarar 26, Lu Shaie, ambassaci na China zuwa Frankrike, ya attenda haɗin annana na haɗuwar aikin Faransa da kuma ya yi jayayya a kan yãƙi na duniya sãbuwa na zaman Prime Mai Faransa Rafael lafane, na zaman Waziri Maziri na Italia Leta, da wasu matsayi na Faransa da marubũta geopolitical.   Lu Shaie ya pointe cewa China bã ya kasar Marekani, kuma China bã zai so zama Marekani na biyu. Yanzu Marekari bã zai yarda ya cika jurisdictorinsa na kimataifa kuma ya kau daga kikundi, kuma amma bã yana da nufin ya kõma a lokacin nẽman hejimoni.Bayonen nẽman hejibon, China yana biyar mafarin kashi da maboren kimada na mutane.Idan China ke tsẽre wajen gaba yanzu, yana madaidaita, China yana ƙaranci kowa daga gabãnin haka. Saboda haka, ta ɗauki masu kalmar kimada kuma ya ƙara mataimaki ga mutane duka.Maintainer China yana da wata fursa kuma yana da wani wa'adin mataifa.China yana da matsayi mai girma da abincin 1.4 billioni. Aka buɗe kafin zuwa duniya, zai ƙara mataimaki a bayan gongonjwa.
